question: Nai ji-tsat siu-ji̍k tû-liáu CIB chhī-tiāⁿ ê cheng-chiam, tī hiah-ê nî chhut-hiān tùi chiân chi̍t nî tēⁿ-thâu siāng-tiāⁿ ê cheng-chiam ê cheng-chiam ê nî sī tah-mih nî?
Tī saⁿ-ê nî ê 'sio̍k-chî thiàⁿ-sî sán-gia̍k chāi-chāi' ê sêng-pêng sī siáⁿ-mi̍h?
Chiah-sī ūi-tioh 'cib markets net interest income' siōng koân ê nî, 'average cib markets interest-earning assets' ê siong-tūi ê sōe-jī sī siáⁿ-mih?
Chiu-siâu 2015 chì 2017 nî ê 'cib markets choân-téng sìn-chha̍h chu-pûn ê siū-lī' ê piàn-tōng.
answer: Chiah ê piàn-tōng chin bô-tēng. 1.04 ê siū-lī tī 2015 nî kàu 1.22 tī 2016 nî ê sî, cheng-ka liáu 17.3% chiap-kīn, chiū-án-ne tī 2017 nî cheng-chha̍p lo̍h-khì kàu 0.86, tiām-tī 29.5% chiap-kīn.

question: Tui 'cib markets net interest income' toi 5,000 million 'iaⁿ' kah 'net interest yield on average cib markets interest-earning assets' toi 1.10 'iaⁿ' ê nî-tsūn tsūi-kè ū tó-ūi?
Tī 2016 nî, hiah-ê "pêng-kun tì-chiam sán-phín tài-khuân" ê lē-bīn, "pêng-kun CIB tāi-chìng uán tài-khuân" chiàm to-siàu phiah-sò͘?

Nāi-chiáh 'cib markets net interest income' tī 2017-nî nā-sī ceng-ka 20% hām 'net interest income 2013 managed basis' bô piàn-tōa, sinn ê 'net interest income excluding cib markets' ē chiâⁿ-choán-chóaⁿ?

Àn-chāu chit-ê piáu, kò-nn̄g ê saⁿ tang lâi kóng, chāi 'net interest income 2013 managed basis' hām 'net interest yield on average interest-earning assets 2013 managed basis' chit nn̄g hāng chi-kan ūi-tio̍h-ê koan-liân ū khòaⁿ-ê chhut bái?
answer: Ū, ū chi̍t ê bêng-hián ê chiàⁿ ê koan-liân. Chāi 'net interest income 2013 managed basis' tùi 2015 nî ê $44,620 pah-bān tòe-tè kēng-ka kàu 2017 nî ê $51,410 pah-bān ê sî, 'net interest yield on average interest-earning assets 2013 managed basis' mā piáu-hiān chū 2.14% kàu 2.36% ê tòe-tè kēng-ka, tī chāi tòe saⁿ tang ê sî-kan lāi.

question: Tī chit ê piáu lāi-bīn, gī-hôi nn̄g ê metric, chiah-ê hō͘ thâu-ê hūn tē-jī ê, ē-sái thiam-á chò "net interest yield on average interest-earning assets excluding cib markets"?
answer: net interest income excluding cib markets ( a )
average interest-earning assets excluding cib markets

question: Tī-ê '2013 nî siu-koân chu-téng ê siâⁿ-chúi sêng-pâi' ê nî-tó͘ tâng-ke-tâng-ke tńg-tńg ê tiàu-á, kah pa̍t-ê kî-kan pí, ūi-séⁿ sī î-goân ê nî-tō͘?
answer: 2017 nî sī î-goân, in-ūi i ê tâng-ke-tâng-ke tńg-tńg ê cheng-tióng chin tōa. Tùi 2016 nî kàu 2017 nî ê cheng-tióng sī $4,118 pah-bān mé-jí（$51,410 - $47,292）, chiâⁿ-chòe chin tōa ê $2,672 pah-bān mé-jí ê cheng-tióng tùi 2015 nî kàu 2016 nî（$47,292 - $44,620）.

question: Tī 2016 nî, bô pau-hâm CIB markets ê net interest income (bâi bān-á ê giâⁿ) sī siáⁿ-chē?
